TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog

summary.span: 表示會顯示可用色彩的通用對話方塊，其附帶的控制項可讓使用者定義自訂色彩。

span.span: Represents a common dialog box that displays available colors along with controls that enable the user to define custom colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承的成員必須叫用它來建立這個特定的通用對話方塊。The inherited member must be invoked to create this specific common dialog box. 您可以覆寫實作特定的對話方塊攔截程序功能。 can be overridden to implement specific dialog box hook functionality. 使用擷取使用者所選取的色彩。Use to retrieve the color selected by the user. 當您建立的執行個體，部分讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始的值。When you create an instance of , some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立新。The following example illustrates the creation of new . 這個範例需要的方法從呼叫具有現有表單內和置於其上。This example requires that the method is called from within an existing form that has a and placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體，下列的讀取/寫入屬性設定為初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`Color.Black`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| 您可以變更其中任何一個屬性，透過單獨呼叫屬性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以使用對話方塊來定義自訂色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can use the dialog box to define custom colors.

value.span: 如果使用者可以定義自訂色彩，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user can define custom colors; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`false`會停用相關聯的按鈕在對話方塊中，使用者無法存取自訂色彩控制項，在對話方塊中。When set to `false`, the associated button in the dialog box is disabled and the user cannot access the custom colors control in the dialog box. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立新。The following example illustrates the creation of new . 這個範例需要的方法從呼叫具有現有表單內和置於其上。This example requires that the method is called from within an existing form that has a and placed on it. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出對話方塊是否顯示基本色彩集中的所有可用色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays all available colors in the set of basic colors.

value.span: 如果對話方塊顯示基本色彩中的所有可用色彩，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the dialog box displays all available colors in the set of basic colors; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化設定，屬性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a setting the , properties. 不會的啟用使用者設定自訂的色彩，但它可讓一組完整顯示基本色彩。The does not enable the user to set a custom color, but it enables the full set of basic colors be displayed. 當您設定屬性設`false`、 它允許組合使用 256 的系統上其他色彩的色彩顯示，或小於色彩。When you set the property to `false`, it enables the display of colors that are combinations of other colors on systems with 256 or less colors. 此範例也會示範設定屬性和處理對話的事件。The example also shows setting the property and handling a event for a dialog. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單並呼叫`InitializeColorDialog`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeColorDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 這個範例需要`Click`按鈕的事件所連接的範例中所定義的事件處理常式方法。This example requires that the `Click` event of the button is connected to the event-handler method defined in the example. summary.span: 取得或設定對話方塊中顯示的自訂色彩集。

span.span: Gets or sets the set of custom colors shown in the dialog box.

value.span: 對話方塊中顯示的自訂色彩集。

span.span: A set of custom colors shown by the dialog box.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以建立自己的自訂色彩集。Users can create their own set of custom colors. 中包含這些色彩不必建立色彩的 BGR （藍色、 綠色、 紅色） 值所組成。These colors are contained in an composed of the BGR (blue, green, red) values necessary to create the color. 如需有關此資料結構的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on the structure of this data, see . 如果僅能定義自訂色彩設為`true`。Custom colors can only be defined if is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何新增類型的陣列表示要自訂色彩。The following code example shows how to add an array of type representing custom colors to . 這個範例需要程式碼從執行中。This example requires that the code is run from within a . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當開啟對話方塊時，是否可以看到用來建立自訂色彩的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the controls used to create custom colors are visible when the dialog box is opened

value.span: 如果對話方塊開啟時可用自訂色彩控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the custom color controls are available when the dialog box is opened; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，自訂色彩控制項不會顯示當第一次開啟的對話方塊。By default, the custom color controls are not visible when the dialog box is first opened. 您必須按一下`Custom Colors` 按鈕以顯示它們。You must click the `Custom Colors` button to display them. > [!NOTE] > 如果已`false`，然後沒有任何作用。If is `false`, then has no effect.

summary.span: 取得基礎視窗執行個體控制代碼 (HINSTANCE)。

value.span: ，包含視窗控制代碼的 HINSTANCE 值。

span.span: An that contains the HINSTANCE value of the window handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會使用若要防止呼叫來自不受信任的程式碼; 只有立即呼叫端必須具有權限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果您的程式碼可以從部分信任程式碼呼叫，不會傳遞使用者輸入類別而不需驗證的方法。If your code can be called from partially trusted code, do not pass user input to class methods without validation. 如需使用重要的限制`LinkDemand`成員，請參閱[Demand 與。LinkDemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5)。For important limitations on using the `LinkDemand` member, see [Demand vs. LinkDemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5). 這個屬性也會使用安全性屬性，來覆寫這個成員在衍生的類別必須具有`CustomPermission`權限。This property also uses the security attribute; to override this member, the derived class must have the `CustomPermission` permission.

permission.span: 操作與 unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: for operating with unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性就適用於等於或少於 256 色彩的系統。This property is applicable to systems with 256 or fewer colors. 在這些類型的系統中，部分色彩十分複合應用程式的其他人。On these types of systems, some colors are composites of others. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化設定，屬性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a setting the , properties. 不會的啟用使用者設定自訂的色彩，但它可讓一組完整顯示基本色彩。The does not enable the user to set a custom color, but it enables the full set of basic colors be displayed. 當您設定屬性設`false`、 它允許組合使用 256 的系統上其他色彩的色彩顯示，或小於色彩。When you set the property to `false`, it enables the display of colors that are combinations of other colors on systems with 256 or less colors. 此範例也會示範設定屬性和處理對話方塊中的事件。The example also shows setting the property and handling a event for a dialog box. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單並呼叫`InitializeColorDialog`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeColorDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 這個範例需要`Click`按鈕的事件所連接的範例中所定義的事件處理常式方法。This example requires the `Click` event of the button is connected to the event-handler method defined in the example.
